titleStmt.title: Two petitions to the honourable Court of Parliament in behalfe of episcopacy. One delivered by Sir Thomas Aston from the County Palatine of Chester. The other from the citties of L. and W.
titleStmt.author: Aston, Thomas, Sir, 1600-1645.
